# Core Module

## Purpose
Plugin infrastructure and core audio processing components.

## Public Headers
- `SpectralCanvasProProcessor.cpp` - Main JUCE AudioProcessor implementation

## Dependencies
- JUCE framework (juce_audio_processors, juce_audio_utils)

## Compile Flags
None currently.

## Owner
Core audio processing team

## RT-Safety Notes
- `processBlock()` must remain allocation-free
- Use atomic operations for parameter changes
- Bounded work per audio block (â‰¤16 operations)

input.content:
# DSP Module

## Purpose
Digital signal processing engines and audio algorithms.

## Public Headers
- `PsychoacousticMaskingEngine.h` - Perceptual masking threshold calculation

## Dependencies
- Standard library (span, vector, memory)
- Custom AlignedAllocator for SIMD optimization

## Compile Flags
- `SC_ENABLE_PSYCHO` - Enable PsychoacousticMaskingEngine (default OFF)

## Owner
DSP algorithms team

## RT-Safety Notes
- All processing methods marked `noexcept`
- Pre-allocated SIMD-aligned buffers (64-byte alignment)
- No heap allocations in RT-critical paths
- Mathematical pipeline is locked - do not modify core formulas

# UI Module

## Purpose
User interface components and editor implementation.

## Public Headers
- `SpectralCanvasProEditor.cpp` - Main JUCE AudioProcessorEditor implementation

- Core module for processor communication

## Compile Flags
None currently.

## Owner
UI/UX team

## RT-Safety Notes
- UI thread only - no direct audio thread interaction
- Use lock-free queues for audio thread communication
- All parameter changes must be atomic
- No blocking operations in paint() methods

# Utils Module

## Purpose
RT-safe utilities, lock-free data structures, and helper functions.

## Public Headers
None currently. Planned:
- `SpscQueueLite.h` - Single-producer, single-consumer lock-free queue
- `Snapshot.h` - RT-safe telemetry counters
- `MaskColumn.h` - Paint event data structures

## Dependencies
- Standard library (atomic, memory)
- Platform-specific alignment (posix_memalign/_aligned_malloc)

## Compile Flags
None currently.

## Owner
RT-safety and infrastructure team

## RT-Safety Notes
- All utilities must be real-time safe
- Lock-free implementations only
- Trivially copyable data structures preferred
- Bounded operations with known maximum execution time

Now I need to update the CMakeLists.txt to fix the naming inconsistency and use explicit file lists. Looking at the current CMakeLists.txt, I can see several issues:

1. The project name is mixed - it uses both SpectralCanvasLite and SpectralCanvasPro
2. Lines 30-40 reference SpectralCanvasLite but the plugin target is named SpectralCanvasPro
3. The source files need to be organized into explicit lists per module
4. We need to add feature flags for SC_ENABLE_STUB and SC_ENABLE_PSYCHO
5. Need to add strict compiler warnings

Let me update it properly.

input.old_string:
# MINIMAL SpectralCanvasLite - 30 lines total
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.22)
project(SpectralCanvasLite VERSION 1.0.0)

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 20)

include(FetchContent)
FetchContent_Declare(juce
    GIT_REPOSITORY https://github.com/juce-framework/JUCE.git
    GIT_TAG 8.0.8)
FetchContent_MakeAvailable(juce)

juce_project("SpectralCanvasPro")

juce_add_plugin(SpectralCanvasPro
    COMPANY_NAME "YourCompany"
    PLUGIN_VERSION 1.0.0
    IS_SYNTH FALSE
    NEEDS_MIDI_INPUT FALSE
    FORMATS VST3 Standalone
    PRODUCT_NAME "SpectralCanvasLite")

target_sources(SpectralCanvasPro
    PRIVATE
        Source/SpectralCanvasProProcessor.cpp
        Source/SpectralCanvasProEditor.cpp
)

# MSVC specific options
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(SpectralCanvasLite PRIVATE /W4 /FS)
endif()

target_compile_definitions(SpectralCanvasLite PRIVATE
    JUCE_WEB_BROWSER=0
    JUCE_USE_CURL=0
    JUCE_VST3_CAN_REPLACE_VST2=0)

target_link_libraries(SpectralCanvasLite PRIVATE
    juce::juce_audio_utils)
input.new_string:
# SpectralCanvasLite - Clean Foundation Build System
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.22)
project(SpectralCanvasLite VERSION 1.0.0)

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 20)

# Feature flags (default OFF for incremental development)
option(SC_ENABLE_STUB "Enable SpectralEngineStub path" OFF)
option(SC_ENABLE_PSYCHO "Enable PsychoacousticMaskingEngine" OFF)

include(FetchContent)
FetchContent_Declare(juce
    GIT_REPOSITORY https://github.com/juce-framework/JUCE.git
    GIT_TAG 8.0.8)
FetchContent_MakeAvailable(juce)

# Explicit source file lists per module (no GLOB patterns)
set(SC_CORE_SOURCES
    Source/Core/SpectralCanvasProProcessor.cpp
)

set(SC_UI_SOURCES
    Source/UI/SpectralCanvasProEditor.cpp
)

set(SC_DSP_SOURCES)
if(SC_ENABLE_PSYCHO)
    list(APPEND SC_DSP_SOURCES
        Source/DSP/PsychoacousticMaskingEngine.cpp
    )
endif()

set(SC_UTILS_SOURCES)
# Utils sources will be added in Phase 2

juce_add_plugin(SpectralCanvasLite
    COMPANY_NAME "YourCompany"
    PLUGIN_VERSION 1.0.0
    IS_SYNTH FALSE
    NEEDS_MIDI_INPUT FALSE
    FORMATS VST3 Standalone
    PRODUCT_NAME "SpectralCanvasLite")

target_sources(SpectralCanvasLite
    PRIVATE
        ${SC_CORE_SOURCES}
        ${SC_UI_SOURCES}
        ${SC_DSP_SOURCES}
        ${SC_UTILS_SOURCES}
)

# Strict compiler warnings (warnings as errors)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(SpectralCanvasLite PRIVATE /W4 /WX /FS)
else()
    target_compile_options(SpectralCanvasLite PRIVATE -Wall -Wextra -Wpedantic -Werror)
endif()

# Feature flag definitions
if(SC_ENABLE_STUB)
    target_compile_definitions(SpectralCanvasLite PRIVATE SC_ENABLE_STUB=1)
endif()

if(SC_ENABLE_PSYCHO)
    target_compile_definitions(SpectralCanvasLite PRIVATE SC_ENABLE_PSYCHO=1)
endif()

target_compile_definitions(SpectralCanvasLite PRIVATE
    JUCE_WEB_BROWSER=0
    JUCE_USE_CURL=0
    JUCE_VST3_CAN_REPLACE_VST2=0)

target_link_libraries(SpectralCanvasLite PRIVATE
    juce::juce_audio_utils)
